alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:23AM CST until January 03 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MONROE...SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND CENTRAL ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 322 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Almyra, or 9 miles south of Stuttgart, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gillett... Almyra... Little Bayou Meto Park... De Witt... Langford... De Luce... Lodge Corner... Reydell... Crocketts Bluff... Lawrenceville... Tichnor... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
